creditline: Collection of Yvonne and Gabriel P. Weisberg
description: cat. 19; three women seated; very dark except for women's white hats; gold around sight; beige paper; grey-green mat with artist's name; highly decorated gold frame with heavy red undertones
medium: Black charcoal heightened with white gouache with traces of gum glazing on cream paper
title: Three Breton Women Seated
